title: Northeast Corridor New York-Washington - Southbound
heading: Northeast Corridor New York-Washington - Southbound
bottom_text: Local connecting trains are provided: at New York and intermediate stations by the MTA, at New York, Philadelphia, and all stations in New Jersey by NJ Transit, at Trenton, Philadelphia and Wilmington by SEPTA, at Baltimore, BWI, New Carrollton, and DC by the Maryland Transit Administration, at New Carrollton and DC by WMATA, and at DC, Manassas and intermediate stations byVRE.
